thread.section_title: Australian Business & World Finance News - Yahoo!7 Finance
thread.title: Macquarie enters trading halt

title: Macquarie enters trading halt
text:
Thu, Oct 8, 2015, 11:01 AM AEDT - Australia Markets close in 4 hrs 59 mins Macquarie enters trading halt Yahoo7 Finance – 39 minutes ago Recommend Print Macquarie Group has halted trading in its shares amid speculation it is about to announce the acquisition of ANZ's Esanda Dealer Finance unit. 
In its trading halt request to the share market on Thursday, Macquarie did not respond to the speculation. 
Fairfax reports that Macquarie's corporate and asset finance division is buying the Esanda unit and plans to raise $400 million to fund the deal. 
Source: AAP Aust shares open higher AAP 
The Australian share market has opened nearly one per cent higher. At 1011 AEDT on Thursday, the benchmark S&P/ASX200 … Terms
